name: Beer Is OK Membership
description:
We are Oklahoma beer enthusiasts. We want to support our local brewers by cultivating the relationship between the people in Oklahoma who love beer and the locals who are making it. We want to introduce people to another Oklahoma product they should be proud of.

We're going to tour brewing facilities and help you fall in love with Oklahoma craft beer. You'll get a pretty decent beer education, and you'll hang out with people who are excited about what's happening in Oklahoma beer culture. You'll get a chance to talk to the brewers, taste their beers, and cheer them on.
As an organization, our goal is to support our local brewers, make some awesome new friends, and take some great trips. If that sounds like something you'd like to be a part of, purchase your membership and attend our next event. We can't wait to introduce you to Oklahoma beer.

name: Beer Is OK logo shirt
description:
The shirt that started all the hype. Don't want to be a member but just love the shirt? No problem. We need all the advertising we can get. 

Don this heavy duty Hanes tagless tee and show the country Oklahoma is craft beer. 

(Men's sizes)

name: Beer Is Oklahoma
description:
Craft beer is Oklahoma. Show your Okie pride with this comfortable tri-blend crew neck tee.

Other states boast some great beers but none as well crafted and made with love like Oklahoma beer. Show the country what we're made of and wear with pride.

Color - Eco True Royal

Alternative description below:

- 4.1 oz., 50/38/12 polyester (6.25% recycled)/cotton (6.25% organic)/rayon, 20 singles
- Low-impact yarn dyed and washed
- Mitered v-neck
- Blind stitched sleeves and bottom hem

name: Cascade Perfume
description:
Ladies, are you someone that loves craft beer but can never find a shirt that truly expresses your feelings? Look no further.

This comfortable, tri-blend unisex shirt from Alternative tees shows your love for craft beer and those floral cascade hops.

Below are Alternative specs:

- Unisex sizes
- 4.1 oz., 50/38/12 polyester (6.25% recycled)/cotton (6.25% organic)/rayon, 20 singles
- Low-impact yarn dyed and washed
- Mitered v-neck
- Blind stitched sleeves and bottom hem
